Okay so first thing first, if you want a phone that can game well, can capture good snaps and an overall package go for iqoo legends other then that if you want to flash custom rom in sd 870 then you can think about this as iqoo have locked bootloader , now that's aside let's move on to review
also known as k40/poco f3 mi11x can easily become your daily driver, if you can get this phone in 20-25k bracket during offers, if it costs more then that go for some other phone, this phone have great combination of specs and looks, silver edition.

Pros : Great Display, but some of the phones have black crush issue, mine don't have any such and display can be set to 60hz/120hz by default it is set to 60hz possibly to conserve battery.

Processor : SD 870 is better then SD 888 imo as it doesn't heats up like kiln like 888 does, SD 870 is power hungry chip so it does makes the phone warm while you are playing heavy games like Genshin Impact, still the performance does not drop, Dimensity is also great but SD 870 have good ROM support from the devs, and cherry on top you can unlock the bootloader after the phone warranty ends and you can kick out miui and get the pixel experience asap,

Battery: Good battery life for a day, 120hz is battery drainer so remember to keep the display to 60hz with battery saver if you want the phone to last 2 days still with 120hz you can last whole day

Charging : 33w charger makes sure you can reach full charge in a hour, and does not kills battery like the 120w charger does

Sound: The dolby is implemented well and it does sounds clear.

Build Quality : it does feels premium, go for the silver edition as black edition is glossy amd finger print magnet

Now for the cons

Proximity Sensor : Xiomi uses Virtual proximity Sensor which is another way of saying it doesn't of proximity sensor and it uses accelometre to mimic proximity sensor and that causes problems , it is not deal breaking but still cannot deny physical proximity sensor would have been better

Cameras: Don't even want to talk about this, Poco f1 had better cameras then this. it is good camera but yeah if you want phone with good cameras go for some other phone.

These are the things which you should knoe beforehand making a decision to go with this phone or not

I am writing this review after using this phone for 10 days. Quick summary below is followed by detailed feature wise experience that I had while using this phone.

Pros: Great performance, Amazing screen, Good stereo speakers, good haptic feedback, slim phone and good in hand feel/ balance
Cons: Average rear camera, bloatware/ preinstalled apps in MIUI, no 256 Gb option, fingerprint magnet (cosmic black version), no 3.5 mm jack (it still matters for some :) )

I am adding a detailed review below for those who are interested in details -

Build - The phone is sleek and quite slim compared to other phones. Overall in hand feel is definitely premium. The rounded camera setup also looks nice. The back however is a fingerprint magnet and too glossy (cosmic black variant). It took me a while to get used to side mounted fingerprint sensor, but once used to - it is quite snappy and well placed

Screen - The screen is amazing and the 120hz option definitely helps the overall experience. Brightness in sunny condition is more than enough, especially if on Auto. Bezels are super slim and the front camera punch hole is so small, you hardly notice it. Haptic feedback is also very nice

Camera - The camera is definitely not the best feature of this phone but it is not as bad as some people claim. Its a decent performer and does well in well lit surroundings. Indoor and low light photos are not that great though. Macro shots came out surprisingly well. Selfie cam is quite wide and great for group selfies. Overall a decent performer. But if camera is the main feature for you, then you should probably look for other options.

Sound - The stereo speakers are surprisingly good! the sound is quite clear, loud enough and well balanced. While using headphones, I did find the sound to be a bit flat and focused on high frequencies (Treble). The settings allow you to tweak equalizer settings though so after that adjustment, mids (vocal) and lows (bass) come out decent. Usb type c to 3.5 mm jack dongle is provided within the box (good news for those who prefer wired headphones like me!)

Performance - The day to day usage is very snappy and gives you a buttery smooth experience. Apps open up quite fast and memory management is balanced as well. I have 6Gb variant and didn't feel any need of more RAM

Gaming - I tried out call of duty and Freefire on this phone along with some other less intensive games. all of them ran smoothly at high settings. The phone does get bit warm during extended gaming sessions but stays at an acceptable temperature. For moderate to high intensity gamers - this phones seems perfect

Battery - The battery lasted 30+ hrs (100% to 10%) per charge consistently for me and that was a pleasant surprise as this phone has only 4.5k MAh battery and 120Hz refresh rate can consume battery fast. For moderate users, it should easily last more than a day.

Overall, at this price range (27.5k if you include the offer) I think this phone is a great allrounder and value for money.

Review_title: Device is great just not for photography otherwise perfect device to have.
Review_text:
I have been a Xiaomi user from the very beginning and it is my favourite brand even now.
As we know everything has its ups and downs everyone faces downs so do mi with its miui software the last phone that I used was a poco device (my first and my last poco branding device) . While I was buying this device frankly speaking I was afraid about facing same problems in software in miui but in this device till now no issues related with software faced, so thumbs up for the issues related with software , and mi reallly needs to upgrade it's camera software for better image processing for now I am using gcam which is easily available and accessible so no issue in that part because gcam got it covered. No lag in gaming faced till now. One thing I am confused with is about network issue though I am not confirm if it is some bug or my network provider issue . Review_title: Could have been more better as per price
Review_text:
I have got this device on 14th April, 2022, the device looks very pretty and weight distribution is perfect, camera setup is also good, but 48 MP primery camera in the segment of 30 k is not enough, atleast 64mp they can provide. Battery 4520mAh can also be extend to 5000mAh then it would have more perfect combination. BTW the battery backup on latest miui 13 is very good. The flagship 870 SDM is masterpiece in the device. The amoled display is good but not as bright as samsung devices.

Pros:
1) Snapdragon 870 flagship.
2) dual stereo speakers with dolby atmos
3) latest Android 12
4) build quality
5) front camera good.

Cons:
1) side mounted fingerprint in an amoled display
2) battery charging speed is not enough 33W, could have to 67W
3) 48 mp camera, no ois.

Conclusion:
Its a very good phone perheps so may cons as expected in the price segment. The laggy MIUI feels good in latest miui 13. Hope for more improvement in future update.
Thanks

Manas
Guwahati

Review_title: Best performance phone in this price

3 - 120hz refresh rate makes usage really smooth

Cons :

Verdict I got this phone in 19.5K with offers & exchange phone & it is worth it as it is flagship phone
A piece of advice if you buy this phone full charge the phone first till 100% & then use it

Review_title: Great phone with one small problam
Review_text: I'll give a honest opinion, it's a great home with good display, speakers and great processer the only problem I have is battery. It drain 10-12 % sometimes at time and takes around a hour to charge

This is my second purchase of this phone.I ordered Mi 11i from Flipkart but the exchange person was giving 1200 for my phone.I ordered this phone & got exchange value of 8400 😍.
Camera is average but gcam with a specific lib can be used.I have disabled fp unlock because it was consuming a lot of battery & was giving continuous vibration when wrong finger was being touched.
I have permanently turned on battery saver & restricted the background use of apps which I have installed as a result I’m easily getting battery of 1.5 days.
You can also limit the refresh rate to 90 hz without root with an app.
Charging is super fast.
Display is excellent in natural colour mode.The quality is almost equivalent to my iPhone 12 pro max except in dark scenes.
Overall best phone after discounts & exchange.
Hope it helps.
like

Using mi11x 6gb varient for a month, a short review based on my experience with this mobile.

Pros :
1.Excellent hardware and specifications
2.Battery life is amazing on day to day usage..even after playing games like pubg it lasts for one day mostly.
3.display- very good display with hdr support and memc .
4. Speaker quality is good ..above average than most of the phones in market. It supports Dolby but due to stock type C to 3.5 you can't hear soo great sounds even on iems (- BLON BL-03). if u are a average listener it good.
5. Charging - neither a pro or not a con...it takes 1 hr.

Cons-
1.MIUI- it's a good and worst ui acc to me. Wen you move from pixel or OnePlus, you will really have a bad experience. And nowadays rooting is not a good thing as we use UPI apps .so really worst ui in bugs but good in customisation.
2.CAMERA- it's a good camera, but could have been better to provide a nice optimization. The macro is good but still need to be optimised.
Front camera is good for this price range.
3.PROXIMITY SENSOR- really worst sensor while talking in phone it won't work and there is no pocket mode which will prevent accidental wake in pocket...A HUGE PROBLEM ACC TO ME.
4.RAM USAGE- it always runs with high ram usage with 2 gb free of 6gb. A software optimization is really needed.
5. Some minor problems like full gesture support won't work on 3rd party software like Nova and other launchers.
6. I got random reboot 5-6 times in a month ..may be my unit problem.

For this price it's really worth for battery backup and Snapdragon 870.but if u want a good phone with good experience and don't want to root or anything GO FOR ONEPLUS 9R OR PIXEL .

Review_title: A beast in performance and value for money with Camera compromises
Review_text:
I have been using this device for a couple of weeks , and I can tell it's a real steal at this price given the kind of performance this gives. It is a flagship device which gives a premium MIUI experience than previous devices with less bloatware and almost no ads .
It has a fantastic display and colours and sound . As for the Camera department there is a bit of a let down as they could have used better Camera sensors and better software optimization . I am not a serious photographer so the camera overall gives a decent quality to me and to mention so many Cinematic experience filters and effects present.
The performance is simply best no issue in any Game you play in it .
It does have a little heating issue , but not so major as it gets cool within minutes .
Overall as a user I can assure you that you won't regret as this price as it is giving you more on this price segment .

Phone is working fine, processor speed, Display rate, finger print working , Touch screen good. Camera quality is also good. Gaming support is Good.But mi meed to work on battery, Wifi calling. Battery capacity is not good it's working like 2000Mah draining fast.  Wi-Fi calling is very not so bad, working after upgrade , even Wi-Fi 6 also not working. Supports only 2 5G bands 77,78. super Cool featured phone and working Good

Review_title: Well built, stylish and value for money
Review_text:
Pros:
1) High speed processor
2) Big display with good picture quality
3) Amazing audio quality, thanks to Dolby atmos
4) Game turbo, boosts your gaming experience
5) Fast charging

Cons:
1) Camera in deafult settings, beauty mode.
2) Needs experience with pro mode for optimozed camera usage.
3) Unwanted notifcations, which need to be suppressed manually.
4) Difficult to operate with one hand and is also heavy.

Note: image attached is caught using pro mode.

Review_title: Good phone, average battery, below par camera for price, No 3.5 mm jack so be aware
Review_text:
Pros :
1. Slim and big screen.
2. Android 11 based MIUI 12.5, MIUI is moving towards simplicity now, hence easy to use.
3. Speaker quality is good.
4. 120 Hz display (I am not user of it)

Cons:
1. Mediocre camera for given price. My IQOO 3 has far superior camera.
2. Below average battery life.
3. 33W charging is not as fast.
4. Display is AMOLED but still dull. I haven't played with color settings, if available in OS.
5. No 3.5 mm jack, so not for people who use for gaming / music / video while charging.
6. Bluetooth sound is too low when used in my car for music. May be compatibility issue.

Over all average buy.

Overall it's a good phone if you don't use your phone for capturing photos and if you can get it under 20k on offers.

Review_title: There are Major Issue in this model
Review_text:
1. Major SIM Network Issue is there. hone will show the full network but it is disconnected from the network. The best part is you will never know that your phone is out of network. Nobody will be able to call you. You have to restart the phone again and again or enable/disable flight mode again and again.

2. The Same issue is with the Wi-Fi network as well. Also, the range of WiFi connectivity is very less compared to previous phones like Redmi Note4 and other models.

3. Youtube and other apps are also frequently disconnected from the network. They stop working.

4. Also MIUI 13 is not properly working on this phone.

5. There are a lot of bugs in this phone. This is not a stable version of Redmi.

I dont know why redmi nowadays degrading the quality. I really miss an era when I loved to use redmi phones. Camera quality is totally waste. So I returned both this one and Redmi note 11 also.
I will never purchase any redmi phones now.

Review_title: In one word phone performance is too much low in normal usage
Review_text:
I have purchased it on April 4 th and facing issue in lagging and display sticking in between 20 days. I have got tired of visiting service centre and raising complaint no one is ready to help.
After struggle of a month it's motherboard got changed within a month after purchase but the issue is not solved yet. Now they are not responding I have stucked in the middle worst experience evere with MI.
I recommend you not to buy this product.

Pros:
Fast charging and a large enough battery makes sure you need to charge it only for an hour per day.
Selfie Cam is decent
Cons:
*Primary camera performance under normal and low light is not good. Image processing algo can also be improved
*My screen is glitching during some calls
*Proximity sensor has problems. Screen goes black when you put in loud speaker. Screen comes alive in the pocket and does all sorts of things.
Going to claim the warranty soon.
PS: Overall disappointed by a phone which I thought had a mid-range performance

Review_title: My Redmi Note 5 pro is better than Note 11T
Review_text:
1-Redmi Note 5 Pro having battery 4000 mamp and this Note 11T having 5000 mamp still this is draining fast. I am using half apps compare to note 5 pro.
2-My note 5 pro never got hanged in dual WhatsApp and inspite of 6GB RAM in this phone WhatsApp getting hanged. I am not able to attached photos, contacts a blank appearing in that space ?
3-Earphone also having very low sound inspite raising it to full
4-THIS CALL IS GETTING RECORDED audio getting while recording calls. Unable to disable this found which very BAD.
5-Phone contacts edit option is NOT AVAILABLE AT ALL in phone.
I and my family now having total 10+ redmi phones but due to this redmi note 11T performance I am not sure, I may think for buying redmi again...
I am not returning this as my need of phone is more important than its performance.
Secondly I had also send feedback from time to time but not received any revert over mail or on phone from redmi...

So this is my feedback.... and choice is yours.

Review_title: wi-fi gets disabled if phone is not used for more than 3-4 hours
Review_text:
wi-fi gets disabled if phone is not used for more than 3-4 hours. this is how i identified.
after you wakeup in the morning, check the wi-fi status at the top, it would not be present, now as you have switched on the screen, wi-fi gets connected. showed this issue to the service center, even they dont have solution.

check the attached video.
observe wifi symbol at the top, its not present, as you screen is ON, wifi connects and symbol appears.

unfortunately i ordered two units(mobiles), in both the units this problem exists

Bought this phone, firstly heating issues, that 90hz refresh rate not so well, Mediatek Demensity 810 in other phones are better in functioning, camera isnt also so well i use mostly camera for natural photos and youtube videos, photos and videos are very soft not that much detailing, gaming fps are 35-38fps, 5000mAh battery is ok, Body design is good but not that durable, dual speakers thats just shit! main speaker is good but another is not that high just ok

50 mp camera? Even my 4 year old redmi note 6 pro working more than 100 per better quality of camera! Disappointed for camera quality !Next issue after click on data on it will take 2 min time for start the internet i don't no may be we are using sim2 slot or product issue!

Review_title: Pathetic product delivery experience from Amazon
Review_text:
The phone that was delivered had many problems such as 1. shutting down abruptly in between, 2. The camera not working & 3. Screen touch response is poor look like a damaged piece that was rerouted to another customer (me in this case) post returned from someone else.

Raised complaints and after submitting multiple technicians visit the same technician is getting assigned every time who is denying the visit the place and canceling the technical visit request from his end citing different reasons.

Now, I am stuck between amazon and their technical support team. Amazon not allowing me to return the product without a technical visit and the technician not accepting the request even after multiple attempts.

Dear readers, I bought this cell in great Indian Festival of Amazon, trust me this is nothing less then a nightmare, product is nowhere near its description, go for other product Camera quality is worst both front and back, finger touch sensor doest not works at all, SELLER HAS GIVEN ME USED ITEM WHICH NO ONE (AMAZON NITHER MERCHANT ) IS READY TO TAKE BACK, SEAL OF CELL BOX WAS OPEN, Think twice thrice before buying from amazon

This phone was delivered to me on 26-9-22 and it stopped working after  one day itself.... I advise all Amazon shoppers not to buy phones from Amazon ever.... And I am a heavy purchaser from Amazon but Amazon is not a good place to buy phones....

After trying samsung phones for owr a decade i choose redmi to give a try,belive me it was the worst decision ever.
About 11t 5g
1. Worst calling experience as the speaker and mike both make noise and receive and send voices abruptly. Too much cheap quality mike and speaker.
2. Camera quality is too cheap for a mid range phone
3. Processor is worst.
There is no option to return this phone as within 6 hrs of using it all the above issue arised.
Dont go for this select something else.

One of the worst phone i had buy. The seal of this phone is already broken. The touch is not working good some. Don't buy this phone from this seller. I had complained twice but no response has been taken from the side of Amazon and seller. So please don't buy this phone from this seller.

Review_title: Really A bad/waste product. Don't purchase this product.
Review_text:
Product is OK , Not Good or Super.
Positive Points-
1. Processor is Super
2. Fast Charging works super
3. Good Battery Backup
Negative Points-
1. Display quality below the expectation, Galaxy A51 Display is far batter then this one.
2. Unable to play 2160p Video ,Galaxy A51 play 2160 Videos easily.
3.Pocket Mode is not available, though in Old MI, Redmi smart phones Pocket mode is available.
4.Unable to get/found Group Ringtone Selection, which is really very easy in Galaxy A51.
5.Now maximum no of smart phones have 3 or more rare camera setup, but in this device only 2 camera setup is available. what a feature....
6. Even Galaxy A51 have 32MP selfie camera setup, but in Redmi Note 11T 5G have 16MP selfie camera.

I bought this after lot of research and this is my review after using it on first day
1) decent camera liked the clarity and colours
2) amazing speed and nice performance with two options of 60hz or 90 hz refresh rate which can be chosen , ofc i liked the 90hz as its fluid.
3) 6gb ram + 2gb booster
4) battery is really quick to charge with 33w charger , but initially battery drains quickly but it will optimize after some time
5) need to uninstall bloatwares
6) light weight with punchhole display
7) fingerprint nice and accurate
8) i liked the typing experience , it was really fluid
9) front camera had bit noise in video recording especially but still its decent
10) nice experience with stereo speakers , bottom one is louder than top one.
I recommend it, lets see how it performs in upcoming days

Review_text: This Chinese gadget seems to be in too much of a hurry to unsuccessfully replace google apps with its own pathetic apps. It doesn't allow apps like chrome and messaging app to function properly. Finding difficult to save content to google drive because its inbuilt apps don't sync with the drive. Insists on using its own inbuilt apps and cloud storage. I think that the Chinese gadgets should be content with the profits they can make from hardware expertise, and not try to forcibly meddle with the software part of gadgets. I have another brand of China made tablet but it doesn't force me to change my choices. But I found Oppo very irritating. Anyway, hardware part, so far is okay. I got this mobile about ten days ago.
Was Very anxious to have it, but all fade up during charging time. It got heated up and the battery discharges rapidly. Very disappointed.

Review_title: Poor technology phone.FB/insta/Twitter link open in browser only,not open in present app
Review_text:
Updating after 4month :
-screen recorder not available..which is default function of every android now a days..
-Charging draining faster but charging gaining very slower.
-its not a 21st century phone .. so many basic features missing

Day 1: experience:-
Most important : it will not redirect the link into the present app in mobile .... It will open link every times in default browser..
Eg: if I got any Facebook /insta /Twitter link and I already have installed these app then it will not asking me to get open with app instead it will redirect to browser and again I need to login... So so poor technology
1.processor looks slow while setup and configuration my account data restoration as compare to redmi note 7 (same price older version phone than this)
2. Camera quality is very low both back and front ...capture blurred images..not focusing the face even after setup manually.
3. Not value for money.. I think I made mistake to choose oppo brand .. I compare all the feature with redmi.. redmi looks far better than this..
4. No front flash light available to click in night
5. Looks slow to handle multiple apps compare to redmi
6. Please don't buy this phone..this is so poor technology phone..

Review_title: Not bad but certainly doesn't hit the mark of the best.
Review_text:
Since it's an electronic device, it's better to write down in systemic manner.

Pros :
• Easy UI with smooth performance up to moderate usage.
• Slim design with quite the catchy look.
• Finger print sensor and face recognition is better than other phones in same price range.
• Feels sturdy and can withstand significant amount of physical stress if applied to.

Cons :
• Camera quality is the worst comapred to others.
• Battery drains up quickly.
• Sometimes with heavy usage, it lags in between which can be annoying at times.

I only bought it because I was getting 5K off on exchange offer and my dad was going to use this one. So it's perfect for him.
